hero.title:

Repeat.
hero.subtitle: yreh is a solo studio shipping software products fast — launching, learning, and iterating until something sticks. No investors, no permission, no waiting.

philosophy: Most ideas fail. That's the point. Ship enough products, and the market tells you which one deserves your next decade. Volume is the strategy.

contact.headline: Let's build something
contact.description: Open to collaborations on ambitious projects and selective freelance work. I ship fast without cutting corners — high velocity, high polish.

seo.title: yreh — Solo Software Studio | Build, Ship, Repeat
seo.description: Solo bootstrapped studio shipping polished software products fast. Building in public, launching MVPs, and iterating until something sticks. Open for collaboration and freelance.
